outputs.output_descr: Expansion of Successful Poverty Reduction and Women Empowerment Model in West Africa. To enable small holders women farmers to increase and diversify their income by developing 600 multifunctional platform based agro-enterprises in Burkina Faso, Mali & Senegal

project_descr: l'Energie pour la lutte contre la pauvreté en Afrique Subsaharienne : dynamiser le développement rural à travers la plate forme multifunctionelle
project_title: RAF/03/013- Multifunctional Platform- Energy Poverty Red
